original_title: ラブライブ！虹ヶ咲学園スクールアイドル同好会 First Live “with You”
overview: The first live concert of the  Nijigasaki High School Idol Club group in the Love Live franchise, held at Musashino Forest Sports Plaza on December 14 & 15, 2019. The Blu-ray of the concert was released on August 5, 2020.
title: Love Live! Nijigasaki High School Idol Club First Live with You!
